ADD.Customer: (CustomerID int AUTO_INCREMENT primary key, StateID int, Churn tinyint, Name VARCHAR(255))
ADD.Evidence: (EvidenceID int AUTO_INCREMENT primary key, Date date, CustomerID int, StateID int, TagID int, Content text, Source VARCHAR(2083))
ADD.State: (StateID int AUTO_INCREMENT primary key, Name text)
ADD.Tags: (TagID int AUTO_INCREMENT primary key, Name VARCHAR(50), Description VARCHAR(255))
